choices.text: ASK ABOUT ROPE IN THE WARDROBE
ASK ABOUT PROJECT BRAVE NEW WORLD

text: It’s called ASH BROWN, I’m trendy!
My parents are always somewhere outside the country. I live by myself.
What rope? Where?
That’s how rich people resolve conflicts nowadays, huh? Those hypocrites, ha! If everyone can afford their service then I do agree with their ideals tho...
I said GET OUT. Well, since you don’t do it yourself, I’ll have to make you leave!
07.name: combat

text: I don’t understand...I thought we were friends...
But turned out he was one of them...making fun of me, calling me names, destroying my stuff, slapping and kicking me...
I don’t understand...all those things just don't make any sense AT ALL.
HE WAS THE ONE THAT ASKED ME TO BE HIS FRIEND!
He said if I dye my hair brown, I would be as popular as him, or even K.K. I told him I was color-blind and couldn’t dye it myself, so he helped me.

Then everyone was laughing at my hair, even the teachers. I asked him why and he said it was just that people were jealous of my hair. What a ridiculous lie! As if he didn’t bother to convince me! I mean, even I wasn’t fooled by that...
I...I was furious and was about to scream at him and even hit him-I was always a quiet kid, so you get how mad I was at that moment.
That’s when he gave that smile.
It was the sweetest and the most sincere smile I’ve ever seen.
For a moment, I almost thought I was standing right in front of an angel.
Though I wanted to believe it was an accident but there really wasn’t any other way to think of it. He knew me so well and yet he made things worse...
It’s been a really long time since then. Why do you have to bring it all up again to hurt me?
I’m really sorry that you have to go through all that.
For god’s sake, save your sympathy!
YOU
DISGUST
ME
I need some sleep. Now get out of my sight.
Poor kid. Seems like he commited suicide years ago. What A did was truly unforgivable. We need to find him.
You should try to gather as much as evidence as possible.
I don’t know the guy you’re looking for. Get out and Leave me alone.

You wanna give me 1000 dollars? Nah I can’t take your money but thanks! Btw here’s a coupon I found on the street. Apparently I’m too young for the project but you seem rich so maybe you can use it on people you hate.

After he helped me dye my hair, I went to school the other day everyone was staring at me laughing so hard, even the teachers laughed a little bit. I couldn’t figure out why so I asked him and he said it was just that people were jealous of my hair...
I only told him about this...but later everyone knew...
I guess they just figured it out themselves somehow...I mean since he promised he wouldn’t tell anyone.
He said I would be popular too if I dye my hair brown, as popular as K.K., and people would stop bullying me and be friends with me...
He was always there when I was depressed and scared and he was the only person that listened when I talked. He even told me I was his best friend...
Unlike me, he was popular and had a lot of friends and he was nice to everyone. He was perfect. I wanted to be just like him.
Wow congrats you’ve digged out all my little secrets! You’re satisfied, Mr.detective? Now GET OUT!
You are awake, finally. My name’s Pearl, and you are?
Oh hey, I’m...
My name is...ah...
I...I don’t remember...How...how could I forget my name?? I...what happened to me?? What...
Calm down, you will be fine. Now close your eyes and take a deep breath. What is the first that pops into your mind?
Ah...your face? I don’t remember a thing! Nothing!
Relax. Focus on your breath.
I...I remember hearing someone say...a project…It has something to do with a new world...
Is it Project Brave New World that you’re hearing?
I think so. What is it about?
Now try to think of someone, either a name or a face, that is associated with this project.
There is a man...a criminal...I’m after him...and...he is in this project...
Can you recall his name?
Why don’t you walk around a little bit? Maybe picking up these things on the ground will help you remember.
The drain seems clogged, can you check on it for me?
Oh, something got stuck in the drain? You got the tweezers, can you take it out?
This is him, the criminal I’m after!
I...I must find him. I think this might be really important...

I see. If this man you are after is in Project Brave New World, he must have committed some unforgivable sins. It’s for sure going to be a tough journey tracing him down and you might find yourself in some really dangerous situations.
Are you sure you want to find this man?

44.title: Are you sure you want to find this man?

text: I’ll find him. This seems to be the only way out. Plus, I might start to remember things if I get back to my work.

I believe you’ve made the right decision. Remember, no matter what is out there, don’t let anything or anyone shake your resolve. Nothing should stop you. Gathering evidence and bringing this man to justice is the only way to compensate the victims.
I still need to think about it...
Don’t worry, there is time for you to think this over. I’ll wait until you’re ready.
